page.title: 04FORESTRY COMMISSION.
page.content: The Bellingham offices of the forestry commission control 50 700 hectares of forestry land and are responsible for the care and maintenance of 3 forestry villages.450 hectares of trees are planted every year,and 30 to 40 contr_ actors are employed to pull trees up. 10 to 15 office workers are also empl_ oyed.The local people are for the forestry commission because it brings many jobs to the area.They hope to have doubled their workforce by the end of the century because they are doubling the amount of trees planted. In their workshop 1 mile from the vil_ lage they maintain all their vehicles and machinery.They believe the fores- try commission brings rural employment as well as wildlife facilites,and it contributes to the landscape for which this area is so well known.
